name: Gold Pride - Eliminator
text: If your LP are lower than your opponent's: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. Banish 1 other "Gold Pride" monster from your hand, face-up on the field or in your GY; Special Summon 1 "Gold Pride Token" (Machine/DARK/ATK 0/DEF 0) with the same Level, also this card cannot be used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon for the rest of this turn, unless it is for a "Gold Pride" monster. You can only use each effect of "Gold Pride - Eliminator" once per turn.
